mapper.select: select album.a_no, album.a_name, album.a_cover, album.a_date, album.a_publishing, album.a_agency, album.a_introduce1, album.a_introduce2, art.artist_name, art.artist_no from album album join artist art on album.artist_no = art.artist_no where album.a_no=#{a_no}

select sound.s_no, sound.a_no, sound.s_name, sound.s_lyrics1, sound.s_lyrics2, sound.s_age_yn, sound.s_path, album.artist_no, album.a_name from sound sound join album album on sound.a_no=album.a_no where album.a_no=#{a_no}

select artist.artist_name, artist.artist_no from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where sound.a_no=#{a_no} and sound.s_no=#{s_no}
select artist.artist_name, artist.artist_no from sound_writer writer join artist artist on writer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where writer.a_no=#{a_no} and writer.s_no=#{s_no}
select artist.artist_name, artist.artist_no from sound_composer composer join artist artist on composer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where composer.a_no=#{a_no} and composer.s_no=#{s_no}

select (select count(*) from sound_like where a_no=#{a_no} and s_no=#{s_no}) cnt_like, sound.*, album.a_cover from sound sound join album album on sound.a_no = album.a_no where sound.a_no=#{a_no} and sound.s_no=#{s_no}
select album.a_no, album.a_name, album.a_cover, album.a_date, art.artist_name from album album join artist art on album.artist_no = art.artist_no where album.a_no=#{a_no}

select singer.artist_no, artist.artist_name, album.a_name, album.a_no, album.a_cover, album.a_date from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no = singer.s_no and sound.a_no = singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no join album album on artist.artist_no = album.artist_no where sound.s_no=#{s_no} and sound.a_no=#{a_no}

select board.b_no, board.b_title, board.b_writer , board.b_date
, pl.l_image from sound sound join playlist_content pc on sound.s_no = pc.s_no and sound.a_no = pc.a_no join playlist pl on pc.l_no = pl.l_no and pc.m_id = pl.m_id join board board on board.l_no = pl.l_no and board.m_id = pl.m_id where sound.s_no=#{s_no} and sound.a_no=#{a_no} order by b_no

select s_name, s_path, artist.artist_name, album.a_cover from sound sound join album album on sound.a_no = album.a_no join singer singer on sound.s_no = singer.s_no and sound.a_no = singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where (sound.a_no, sound.s_no) in
(#{item.a_no},#{item.s_no})
order by sound.s_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into sound_like (m_id, s_no, a_no) values (#{member.m_id}, #{sound.s_no}, #{sound.a_no})
